name: karla/delivery
description: Automatically transmit orders from your shop to Karla, providing precise and timely updates to your customers and improving the post-purchase experience.

description.de-DE: Automatische Übertragung von Bestell- und Versandereignissen aus Ihrem Shop an Karla für präzise, zeitnahe Kundenupdates. Verbessert das Kundenerlebnis nach Kauf.
description.en-GB: Automatically transmit orders from your shop to Karla, providing precise and timely updates to your customers and improving the post-purchase experience.
